title: Did You Miss Him? | Guests: President Trump & Nic McKinley | 9/21/21
description:
President Trump joins to talk to Glenn about the drastic difference between his administration and President Biden’s administration. Pat Gray joins Glenn and Stu to discuss President Trump and how much they miss his comedic style. Nic McKinley, the founder of DeliverFund, joins to share the story of the rescued female youth soccer team. Glenn and Stu discuss the future of the economy and where America is heading. Stu gives an update on Hunter Biden’s laptop scandal. A year ago, Glenn reported a story that Biden's ancestors owned slaves, and the media and fact-checkers smeared him and labeled it false. Now, they're reporting the story as true.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
